abstract: Despite a lot of competition during prime time on Monday, NBC’s “Deal or No Deal” and “American Gladiators” managed to rank No. 1 and No. 2 in the ratings. According to Nielsen’s estimates, “Deal or No Deal” delivered the largest audience overall, 15 million viewers at 9 p.m., while “American Gladiators” at 8 p.m. drew 10.7 million viewers.
lead_paragraph: Despite a lot of competition during prime time on Monday, NBC’s “Deal or No Deal” and “American Gladiators” managed to rank No. 1 and No. 2 in the ratings. According to Nielsen’s estimates, “Deal or No Deal” delivered the largest audience overall, 15 million viewers at 9 p.m., while “American Gladiators” at 8 p.m. drew 10.7 million viewers.
